member.name: T:RedCow.GenerateMutable
member.summary: Generate Mutable Attribute. Can be applied to a class to automatically generate properties that are mutable for the specified immutable interface.

member.name: M:RedCow.GenerateMutable.#ctor(System.Type)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The type of the Immutable interface that needs to be implemented.

member.name: P:RedCow.GenerateMutable.ImmutableInterfaceType
member.summary: Gets the type of the Immutable Interface.

member.name: M:RedCow.Immutable`1.Produce(System.Func{`0,`0})
member.summary: Produces the next based on the specified producer function.
